name: @beauty-platform/monorepo
description: Beauty Platform - Enterprise SaaS for beauty salons

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter auth-service dev" "pnpm --filter salon-crm dev" "pnpm --filter admin-panel dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter auth-service dev" "pnpm --filter api-gateway dev" "pnpm --filter crm-api dev" "pnpm --filter admin-panel dev" "pnpm --filter salon-crm dev" "pnpm --filter notification-service dev"
scripts.build: pnpm build:core && pnpm build:services && pnpm build:apps
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter @beauty-platform/ui build && pnpm --filter @beauty-platform/shared-middleware build && pnpm --recursive --filter './services/*' build && pnpm --recursive --filter './apps/*' build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter auth-service start" "pnpm --filter api-gateway start" "pnpm --filter crm-api start" "pnpm --filter notification-service start"
scripts.db:migrate: cd core/database && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd core/database && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd core/database && npx prisma migrate reset

author: DesignCorp
